title: Gboard/MS keyboard enters random characters and needs calibration
content:
This applies to both gboard and ms keyboard.

1. To type a ckeyboard, I must type on between the letter and the letter to the right of it ) notice the "ckeyboard" which should be "character", "on" and the misplaced Parenthesis; I can't correct the latter. 

This makes typing useless. 

2. Occasionally, random characters appear when typing. I once typed "top" and the Phra (see? =) "Ss ? top" appeared. 

3. I have lost the symbol keyboard on gboard. 

Ss keyboard doesn't help (that Ss was ripped (typed) as "changing". 

Clearing the cave (cache) foamy (doesn't) work. 

Ideas?
